item.title: Swift Playgrounds 4: Things we know so far
item.description: During WWDC 2021 keynote Craig Fedrighi teased Playgrounds 4 for iPad by saying that it will bring the ability to “build apps on iPad”. Later that day we saw a short demo of the new Playgrounds during “Platforms State of the Union”, a developer centric keynote that delves deeper into the newly announced tools and technologies. Since that day we haven’t heard anything more about the Playgrounds 4 update.
